overview.tax_residency_rules: Determined by physical presence test: 182 days or more in a calendar year.
overview.tax_filing_frequency: Annually by April 30 for individuals, May 31 for businesses.

personal_income_tax.exemptions: First RM5,000 of employment income is tax-free.
personal_income_tax.social_security: Employees Provident Fund (EPF): 11% of salary (shared between employer and employee).

capital_gains_tax.exemptions: Gains from the sale of primary residence are exempt.

property_tax.rate: Annual assessment based on property value and location.
property_tax.exemptions: Owner-occupied residential property below a certain value.

digital_nomad_visa.available: Yes, through the DE Rantau Nomad Pass.
digital_nomad_visa.tax_benefits: Income tax exemption for the first 12 months.

special_economic_zones.name: Labuan International Business and Financial Centre (IBFC)
special_economic_zones.tax_incentives: 3% flat corporate tax rate, no withholding tax on dividends.

special_economic_zones.name: Malaysia Digital Economy Centre (MDEC)
special_economic_zones.tax_incentives: Tax breaks for income from digital activities, R&D tax incentives.
special_economic_zones.setup_requirements: Registration as an MSC status company.

double_taxation_agreements.description: Avoids double taxation on income and capital gains.
Avoids double taxation on income and dividends.
Avoids double taxation on income and business profits.
Avoids double taxation on income, dividends, and interest.

crypto_tax.income_tax_rate: Treated as either business income or other income.
crypto_tax.capital_gains_rate: Treated as either business income or other income.

nft_tax.income_tax_rate: Treated as either business income or other income.
nft_tax.capital_gains_rate: Treated as either business income or other income.

additional_notes.economic_stability: Strong economic growth and stable currency.
additional_notes.ease_of_doing_business: Ranked 25th in the World Bank's Ease of Doing Business Index.
